overview: Professor M.M publishes an announcement in newspapers that he needs a healthy person to perform one of his scientific experiments on, in exchange for a sum of half a million pounds. "Hamed" is chosen by the Professor and is able to marry "Aida", but he suffers from the professor’s aides monitoring his movements and behavior all day long, so every step is controlled by the professor with his instructions.

production_companies.name: Masr for Studios and Film Production

title: To Whom it May Concern
